about.summary: Estimates the Vevea and Hedges (1995) weight-function model. By specifying arguments, users can also estimate the modified model described in Vevea and Woods (2005), which may be more practical with small datasets. Users can also specify moderators to estimate a linear model. The package functionality allows users to easily extract the results of these analyses as R objects for other uses. In addition, the package includes a function to launch both models as a Shiny application. Although the Shiny application is also available online, this function allows users to launch it locally if they choose.

Estimates the Vevea and Hedges (1995) weight-function model. By specifying arguments, users can also estimate the modified model described in Vevea and Woods (2005), which may be more practical with small datasets. Users can also specify moderators to estimate a linear model. The package functionality allows users to easily extract the results of these analyses as R objects for other uses. In addition, the package includes a function to launch both models as a Shiny application. Although the Shiny application is also available online, this function allows users to launch it locally if they choose.

name: r-weightr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.0.2' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-weightr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/weightr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/weightr/weightr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8b064feb6e185bcda4f58867c3935ae4d11ce3721762e33822fbb519d2545ee3

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-scales

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-scales

test:
  commands:
    # You can put additional test commands to be run here.
    - $R -e "library('weightr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('weightr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://faculty.ucmerced.edu/jvevea/, https://vevealab.shinyapps.io/WeightFunctionModel/,
    http://faculty.ucmerced.edu/jvevea/other/Vevea_and_Hedges_1995.pdf, http://faculty.ucmerced.edu/jvevea/other/Vevea_and_Woods_Psy_Meth.pdf

  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Estimates the Vevea and Hedges (1995) weight-function model. By specifying arguments,
    users can also estimate the modified model described in Vevea and Woods (2005),
    which may be more practical with small datasets. Users can also specify moderators
    to estimate a linear model. The package functionality allows users to easily extract
    the results of these analyses as R objects for other uses. In addition, the package
    includes a function to launch both models as a Shiny application. Although the Shiny
    application is also available online, this function allows users to launch it locally
    if they choose.

  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
